author: Craig Nelson
title: ‘You Didn't Take Action’: Afghans Reject Official Narrative of War Against Taliban
text:
FARAH, Afghanistan—The weekend visit by a high-level delegation from Kabul to this now calm provincial capital in western Afghanistan promised to be a victory lap of sorts, after the Taliban were driven from the city following two days of fierce fighting last week.
But if President Ashraf Ghani’s cabinet members and a U.S. commander thought they would bask in the laurels of a hard-earned military victory, local officials and residents quickly, and often scathingly, disabused them of that idea during a Saturday meeting in the...
